channel.title: Server status problemo'
channel.description: I'm having a problem with getting my server on the server statuspage. my server is online and I can get on it when ever I run it. When i run it then I go to the server status page to post it up and it says your server is offline, it needs to be online. Can someone tell/help me get it online so everyone can know about it and play on it. It's a really great server. :|

item.title: Server status problemo'
item.dc:creator: @allstar93 allstar93
item.description:
@allstar93 wrote:

u need 2 shut ur firewall off to allow all connections thats the same problem i had wit mine

Read full topic

item.title: Server status problemo'
item.dc:creator: @marc_is_hood marc is hood
item.description:
@marc_is_hood wrote:

Oh lol, I haven’t ran a server in like 6 months so im a little rusty

Read full topic

item.title: Server status problemo'
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Because if you don’t port forward it won’t let you add it because it cannot connect to it. If the server status page says it is offline, you either typed the IP wrong or it is actually inaccessible via the Internet.

And the TPC/IP protocol doesn’t make mistakes, so if it says that the server is offline, it cannot connect to it, and neither can other people.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status problemo'
item.dc:creator: @marc_is_hood marc is hood
item.description:
@marc_is_hood wrote:

[quote=“skiller noob1, post:2, topic:194465”]Did you PortForward? And did you make the exception in your firewall to port 43594? That’s the only way you can put it up is if you PortForward it.[/quote]Why the hell would port forwarding be brought into this thread?, [ONTOPIC] you need a few other people on the server already to post it. Like maybe 1-2 friends online for you to post it so your not running it for yourself only.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status problemo'
item.dc:creator: @amrowbloop amrowbloop
item.description:
@amrowbloop wrote:

I laready port forwarded it

Read full topic

item.title: Server status problemo'
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Did you PortForward? And did you make the exception in your firewall to port 43594? That’s the only way you can put it up is if you PortForward it.

Read full topic

Can someone tell/help me get it online so everyone can know about it and play on it. It’s a really great server.
